Title: BugLister
Description: BugLister is a simple program that helps listing and sorting bugs by type or levels of importance.
HomeWiki:
I Would be happy to recieve suggestions for features or improvments :)

Project Description

BugLister is a simple program that helps listing and sorting bugs by type or levels of importance.

Current Features
  • Save & Load bugs
  • Enumerate bugs
